if exists(select 1 from dmlistlog where id = @id) begin declare @xtype varchar(32), @xtable varchar(64), @c varchar(128), @f varchar(1024), @fname nvarchar(4000), @n int
select @f = '', @fname = '' select @xtype = xtype, @xtable = xtable, @c = controller from dmlistlog where id = @id select column_name as col, cast(N'' as nvarchar(1024)) as colname, ordinal_position as id into #t from information_schema.key_column_usage where table_name = @xtable update #t set colname = b.field_name%l from #t a join @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.syscheckfields b on a.col = b.field and b.ma_ct = @c update #t set colname = case @@language when 'V' then colname + '$l' else '$l' + colname end
select @n = count(1) from #t select @f = @f + case when @f <> '' then ',' else '' end + 'f' + rtrim(id), @fname = @fname + case when @fname <> '' then ',' else '' end + colname from #t order by id if @xtype = '2' select top 1 @f = 'f1', @fname = case @@language when 'V' then field_name%l + '$l' else '$l' + field_name%l end from @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.syscheckfields where ma_ct like N'hr%' and field = 'ma_nv' select @fname = replace(@fname, '$l', case @@language when 'V' then N' hiện thời' else N'Current ' end)
select @n as n, @f as f, @fname as fname return end
